title: Edit mode buttons uneven size/spacing
root_cause: The Select All/Deselect All button uses px-3 py-1.5 text-xs while Delete Selected and Cancel use px-4 py-2 text-sm. This mismatch creates visually uneven button heights. The right-side button group wraps only the conditional Delete Selected button in a flex div with gap-2, while Cancel is always present but outside any gap container â€” leading to inconsistent spacing. No uniform height class (h-9 or h-10) is applied to enforce consistent sizing across buttons.
fix_applied: Standardized all edit toolbar buttons to h-9 px-4 text-sm across ShoppingHub.tsx and TasksHub.tsx. Added gap-2 to the right-side flex container so Delete Selected and Cancel always have consistent spacing. RTL-safe: only logical Tailwind classes used (gap-*, h-*, px-*, py-*).
completion_summary: Edited ShoppingHub.tsx and TasksHub.tsx edit toolbars. Build passed clean.
